content: say hello to snaggle a fuzzy little monster with tons of character crocheted using a fun mix of scheepjes furry tales and catona for the finer details snaggle s fluffy body is topped off with cheeky horns adorable toe beans and a signature snaggle tooth that adds to its mischievous grin place it over a softly tinkling wobble ball and snaggle springs to life in the most delightful way ***creative tip*** want to add a spooky twist to snaggle swap out the white catona yarn for scheepjes glow up and make snaggle s horns snaggle tooth and eyes glow in the dark perfect for an extra dose of mischief after the lights go out **materials** **scheepjes furry tales** 100% polyester 100g/57m yarn a 981 wicked witch x 1 ball **scheepjes caton**a 100% mercerised cotton 50g/125m yarn b 242 metal grey x 1 ball **scheepjes catona** 100% mercerised cotton 25g/62 5 m yarn c 410 rich coral x 1 ball yarn d 105 bridal white x 1 ball yarn e 110 jet black x 1 ball 8mm and 2 5mm crochet hook stitch marker polyester stuffing 110mm diameter wobble ball* 12cm length of elastic * can t find a wobble ball online don t worry your favourite scheepjes retailer will be more than happy to order one for you simply provide them with the following item number and they will take care of the rest 6556-009
